Exclusion criterion allergy apple , presence cancer acquire immunodeficiency syndrome , kidney transplant le 6 month enrol study , take antioxidant nutritional supplement 30 day enrollment , hospitalize within 6 week begin study , suffer acute illness . Subjects instructed keep usual dietary habit duration study , except avoid intake polyphenol-rich food ( i.e. , vegetable , fruit fruit-containing product , chocolate , tea , coffee , honey , alcoholic beverage ) within 2 day intervention . On two different day , volunteer consume 300 mL Fuji AJ , immediately dialysis section . After washout period 3 week , volunteer drink 150 mL Fuji AJ similar manner describe .
